issue.title: [CF 1205] Secure function call bug
issue.body:
No idea about reproduction steps.

TellMeWhen v7.4.0

Log:

1x [ADDON_ACTION_BLOCKED] Аддон 'TellMeWhen' пытался вызвать защищенную функцию 'OverrideActionBarButton1:Show()'.
!BugGrabber\BugGrabber.lua:573: in function <!BugGrabber\BugGrabber.lua:573>
[C]: in function `Show'

> Posted by CurseForge user Frozen_Spider | Imported from CurseForge issue #1205 | Raw

comments.body:
Just Blizzard's broken taint detection. I'm not doing anything to your action bars, I promise. The likely cause is that some other addon you have installed that uses some of the same libraries that TMW uses is causing this.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
